snippet: A Fed rule could mean banks need to find an additional $68 billion to limit risk. | The firm chosen to oversee the revamped SAC has links to the fund. | Investors may be souring on I.P.O.’s. | Comcast makes its case for a merger with Time Warner...
abstract: A Fed rule could mean banks need to find an additional $68 billion to limit risk. | The firm chosen to oversee the revamped SAC has links to the fund. | Investors may be souring on I.P.O.’s. | Comcast makes its case for a merger with Time Warner Cable.

headline.main: An Order for Banks to Hold More Capital
